name: 1Vs100 - Jam
description:
1VS100 is a Top Down Shooter made in 2 days for a private game jam with the theme: "1 Vs 100"

Your goal is to eliminate all the enemies. Unfortunately, each enemy killed gives his strength (max life, damage and ability) to the nearest one, increasing his level. The last one will be as strong as a hundred of them! However, an enemy killed will also upgrade your character depending on his level.

Is there a way to get rid of them?

Controls: ZQSD or WASD to move, aim with the mouse, auto-shoot

The game evolved since the jam, to test the jam version, download the .exe below. (it's not very good, I mean, worse than the actual version ^^)
